description:
URBAN SKETCHING > (drawing) central London, Saturday 3pm – 5pm
https://www.couchsurfing.org/n/repeating-events/urban-sketching-drawing-central-london-saturday-3pm-5pm-london-repeats
Urban Sketching = sketching ( drawing ) in the city > the people , buildings etc in the street, on the metro, in cafes etc
Plz sign up > https://www.facebook.com/events/557780427647053/
Time \ Date: Saturday 11th Jan. 3pm – 5pm

Meeting Place: Leicester Tube Station by Wyndham’s theatre, 32 Charing Cross Road , London WC2H 0DA
Suggested material: note pad or paper (200g or more if going to add splashes of wash, board, soft pencil eg 3B -8B ( mechanical pencil can be more practical for quick sketching ) rubber
,... if u don't have material I am happy to lend u some basic paper and pencil which is perfectly good enough to get by with :) if not done before (but obviously feel free to take whatever u want! ):

if time isn’t good get in touch - maybe can change / have 2 groups

Contact: Dave : [masked] \ mobile:[masked]

ALWAYS CHECK ON THE DAY AS TIME / LOCATION MIGHT CHANGE !!

www.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.com /

Facebook page > www.facebook.com/groups/[masked]/

www.facebook.com/ChillOutCommunityArts99

Drawing 4 Every1 Everywhere = free drawing activities 4 all the community > www.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.com

venue.name: Leicester Tube Station by Wyndham’s theatre
venue.address_1: 32 Charing Cross Road , London WC2H 0DA

name: Urban Sketching (drawing)

description:
URBAN SKETCHING (drawing) Tooting Broadway, Saturday 3pm – 5pm

5pm - 6pm Meet up after in some local Café J  

>  www.facebook.com/events/[masked] /  (plz  sign up)

Urban Sketching = sketching (drawing ) in the city > the people , buildings etc in the street, on the tube, in cafes etc 

RAIN? Don’t worry , we can go to Tooting market J

Plz sign up > https://www.facebook.com/events/557780427647053/

TIME / DATE: Saturday 18th Jan. 3pm – 5pm ( 3pm - 10 mins.  tolerance wait … if late catch us up – we’ll only be a walk away!)

MEETING PLACE: Outside Tooting Broadway Tube Station, London

PRICE: Donations only

30 min. TECHNIQUE HIGHLIGHT: ‘Fast and furious’ – sketching overall impressions

‘CHILL OUT ACTIVITY’ : group drawing

Participants r invited to contribute with own experience / knowledge / activities

Suggested material:

1) paper  a)if only penciling photocopy paper = OK  b) if adding watercolour, paper = at least 200g

2) pencil – for sketching HB – 6B

3) pens black waterproof  .35mm - 1.0mm

4) rubber, sharpener, drawing board + clips 

,... if u don't have material I can lend basic paper + pencil ok to get by with :) 

   

Contact: Dave : [masked]  

mobile:[masked] : no credit to send  SMSs so plz  fone or talk via email. Thx!

More info.: > www.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.com  /

Facebook page > www.facebook.com/groups/[masked]/ 

www.facebook.com/ChillOutCommunityArts99

Drawing 4 Every1 Everywhere = free drawing activities 4 all the community > www.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.com

description:

a) URBAN SKETCHING (drawing), Sunday 3pm – 5pm

Ur Sk = drawing in the city > the people , buildings etc in the street, on the tube, in cafes etc 

b) GET 2GETHER: Meet up after in some local Café J  5pm - 6pm: 

>  www.facebook.com/events/[masked]/  (pls  sign up)

TIME / DATE: Sunday 26th Jan. 3pm – 5pm ( 3pm - 10 mins.  tolerance wait … if late catch us up – we’ll only be a walk away!)

MEETING PLACE: Outside Camden Town tube station

RAIN? Don’t worry- we can go indoors / café / market etc J

PRICE: Donations only

TECHNIQUE HIGHLIGHT: ‘Fast and furious’ – sketching overall impressions

‘CHILL OUT ACTIVITY’: group drawing

LEVEL: all levels welcome (1st timers to professional artists) Participants r invited to contribute with own experience / knowledge / activities

SUGGESTED MATERIAL:

1) paper  a) if only penciling photocopy paper = OK  b) if adding watercolour, paper = at least 200g

2) pencil – for sketching HB – 6B

3) pens black waterproof  .35mm - 1.0mm

4) rubber, sharpener, drawing board + clips 

,... if u don't have material I can lend basic paper + pencil ok to get by with :) 

Contact: Dave : [masked]  \

mobile:[masked] : no credit to send  SMSs so plz  fone or talk via email. Thx!

description:
URBAN SKETCHING (drawing) , Sunday 3pm – 5pm (10 mins. tolerance wait … if late catch us up – we’ll only be a walk away!) MEETING PLACE: Outside Tate Gallery, Millbank, London SW1P 4RG ( 5 mins. walk from Southwark Tube Stn. ( Jubilee line) IMPORTANT: TIME / PLACE CAN CHANGE ACCORDING TO PARTICIPANTS’ AVAILABILITY - CONTACT ME TO CHK IF THERE R ANY ALTERATIONS PRICE: Anonymous Donations only (sealed box passed round) – suggestion any 3 coins ( 1p, 2p, 5p, 10p, 20p, £1, £2 … ’nother words : min. 3p, max £6 )
LEVEL: all levels welcome (1st timers to professional artists) Participants r invited to contribute with own experience / knowledge / activities SUGGESTED MATERIAL: 1) paper a) if only penciling photocopy paper = OK b) if adding watercolour, paper = at least 200g 2) pencil – for sketching HB – 6B 3) pens black waterproof .35mm - 1.0mm 4) rubber, sharpener, drawing board + clips ... if u don't have material I can lend basic paper + pencil ok to get by with :) Contact: Dave : [masked] \ mobile:[masked] / www.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.com

name: FREE Weekly DRAWING, DOODLING, SCRIBBLING WORKSHOP

description:
Drawing to Music Workshop

This is the last workshop with me so plz bring a bit of food and drink for a bit of a party !! 

If u like music and u like drawing then come to the ‘Drawing to Music’ workshop

There r a variety of 10 fun drawing activities where participants draw without taking pencil off the paper, not looking at  paper, draw with non dominant hand etc etc >>> www.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.co.uk/p/10-description-of-weekly-workshops.html

Best to stay from beginning but if u do not have time it is pos to just drop in for a couple of activities.

DATE / TIME: Weds. 23rd 7.15pm – 8.45pm

WHERE: Love & Dye (Hairdresser), 187 Worple Road, Raynes Park, SW20 8RE   - 5 mins. walk from Raynes Park Station / buses 57, 131, 200 ) ( Raynes park = british rail zone 4, one stop after Wimbledon)

PRICE: Anonymous Donations only (sealed box passed round)  – suggestion any 3 coins ( 1p, 2p, 5p, 10p, 20p, £1, £2 )

Dave: [masked]  // mobile:[masked]

MAILING:  To receive info of D4EE activities send email with ‘D4EE’s mailing’ in subject area (no need for message) & send to [masked]  ... U can cancel the mailing when u want.

name: Urban Sketching (DIBUJO FORA DEL CASA)

description:
DRAWING FACES TO MUSIC: Weds. 7pm-9pm PLZ SIGN UP ON FACEBOOK!!! > https://www.facebook.com/events/1445943172338300/?ref_dashboard_filter=upcoming DRAW FACES (ur own, from photos, each others) while listening TO MUSIC:
eg draw without taking ur pencil off the paper, draw looking at each other but not at the paper, draw photo upside down etc ) ONLY 10 SPACES SO PLZ SIGN UP HERE ON FACEBOOK OR GET IN TOUCH TO RESERVE PLACE LEVEL: all welcome from complete novice to pro. PRICE:
D4EE activities = donations only
… Suggestions: a: CASH: £3 b: GOODS ( to cash equivalent eg: art equipment – ok condition 2nd hand is fine) c: SERVICES (2 hours services for 2 hour workshop, eg: admin help etc)
at the end a hat will be passed around, proceeds = to pay for trip to take D4EE* to next destination ( probably Russia but to be confirmed ) TIME / DATE: 7pm – 9pm, Wednesday July 30th WHERE: Love & Dye (Hairdresser), 187 Worple Road, Raynes Park, SW20 8RE - 5 mins. walk from Raynes Park Station / buses 57, 131, 200 ) ( Raynes park = british rail zone 4, one stop after Wimbledon)


-event being filmed to go on YouTube as Drawing4Every1Everywhere promotion ps hey … drinks & biscuits / cake welcome too!!! CONTACT: Dave / [masked] // Mobile:[masked] Blog: ww.drawing4every1everywhere.blogspot.com

www.FACEBOOK.com/drawing4every1everywhere /

description:
Draw with us around the city, the people,  skyline, buildings, in the cafés etc. Take the mobile number in case ur late!  Dave,  mob.,[masked] , 

Urban Sketching = drawing in the Street: Sat. 4pm – 6pm

Meeting: Kottebusser Tor U Bahn ( lines U1 & U8) on the street by the main entrance in the middle where the trains go overhead

Time: 4pm – 10 minutes tolerance wait … if later please fone my mobile … sorry no credit to send SMSs)  

Price: donations only: suggestion

A) MONEY: 2 coins

B) SERVICE: 2 hour service for 2 hour workshop (eg: help with admin, guitar lesson etc)

C) BARTERING (giving objects): Object of same cash value u would give the activity ( eg: art equipment, DVDs etc – 2nd hand or lending is also good ( eg guitar for a month : )

D) … no money etc?  - every1 welcome with a hug and a smile anyway J

Contact:

David Meehan // Mobile:[masked]  // [masked]

www.Drawing4Every1Everywhere.blogspot.com
